column3: You don't look ready to explore the churches... I-I won't take you until you are!
Are you sure you wish to enter with a fixed party?
Are you sure you wish to enter with a matched party?
B-By yourself!? Oh, <Emphasis>please</Emphasis> be careful...for all our sakes!
Are you sure you wish to enter alone?
By invoking the Final Verse, you may challenge a simulacrum of the fiend lurking beyond traverse stone ninety-nine. What will you do?
Proceed to the next traverse stone
Proceed to the next traverse stone with your current party?
